channel.title: course on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in course on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: teaching material
item.description: supervisions I am currently supervising three msc theses on Econometrics at Erasmus School of Economics I am currently supervising three msc theses on Data Science for Marketing Analytics at Erasmus School of Economics I am currently supervising two master theses within the II level master Quantitative methods and models for decision support at University of Rome UnitelmaSapienza the last year I supervised six msc theses at Erasmus School of Economics on Econometrics and Data Science for Marketing Analytics, and fourteen bsc theses at Erasmus School of Economics on Adachi and Trendafilov (2018), Vichi and Kiers (2001) and Bluszcz (2016)
